inventory.name: Frosted Flakes
inventory.description: Get a sweet, crunchy start to your morning with oven-toasted flakes as part of a nutritious breakfast. They're gr-r-reat!

inventory.name: Fruit Loops
inventory.description: The taste, the colour, the fruity aroma. Follow your nose to this breakfast cereal that's made with corn, wheat, whole grain oat flour and natural fruit flavouring.

inventory.name: Pepsi (2L)
inventory.description: Pepsi-Cola hits the spot.

inventory.name: Pizza Pops
inventory.description: Filled with gooey cheese and loaded with meaty pepperoni, Pizza Pops™ are the perfect after-school snack

inventory.name: Black Diamond Cheese
inventory.description: Tasty cheese

inventory.name: Buttermilk Pancakes
inventory.description: A source of 8 essential nutrients, these pancakes make a quick and convenient addition to breakfast or are great as a snack.

inventory.name: Potato Patties
inventory.description: A perfect family favourite - simply bake or fry them for a snack or side dish, any time of day. McCain® Potato Patties are easy to prepare and ready in minutes.

inventory.name: Corn Pops
inventory.description: Try Corn Pops* cereal today for an irresistible big crunch taste

inventory.name: Rice Krispies
inventory.description: Oven tosted cereal made with real grains of milled rice. Fat free and a source of 7 essential nutrients. Less than 1 teaspoon of sugar per serving.

inventory.name: Chocolate and Oats Granola Bar
inventory.description: A high fibre bar with unbelievably delicious taste! Available in three varieties.

inventory.name: Apple Caramel Blossoms
inventory.description: Our Finest Apple Caramel Blossoms® feature golden, flaky pastry gently folded around warm slices of fresh apples topped with rich, buttery caramel.

inventory.name: Spaghetti Vegetable Mix (750g)
inventory.description: A savoury blend of onions, celery, carrots, green and red peppers, to create a perfect spaghetti sauce.

inventory.name: Chicken Vegetable Soup (284ml)
inventory.description: More than just a way to soothe that nasty cold, chicken soup is also a quick and delicious lunch. And with so many varieties to choose from, you'll never get, uh, sick of it.

inventory.name: Prime Rib and Vegetables
inventory.description: This soup contains 25% less sodium than our original recipe and has no artificial colours or flavours.

inventory.name: Vegetable Oil
inventory.description: Vegetable Oil 1.42L

inventory.name: Kettle Cooked BBQ Potato Chips
inventory.description: Lay's® Kettle Cooked Potato Chips - Made with Canadian Potatoes and All Natural flavours.

inventory.name: Loaded Potato Chips (235g)
inventory.description: The premium ridges on Ruffles® potato chips help create the ultimate flavour experience. With their big crunch, deep ridges, and great taste, they're the perfect potato chips for snacking or dipping!

inventory.name: Voss Water
inventory.description: No Company

inventory.name: Multigrain Rounds Tortilla Chips
inventory.description: Tostitos® Multigrain Tortilla Chips - Made with the goodness of Four Grains!

inventory.name: Sour Cream and Onion (225g)
inventory.description: Happiness right out of the box. Enjoy the rich, flaky, melt in your mouth taste of RITZ in a variety of delicious flavours.

inventory.name: Pure Semi-Sweet Chocolate Baking Chips
inventory.description: Baking success is easy with HERSHEY® Pure Semi-Sweet Chocolate Baking Chips because they are fun, easy to use and come in the widest variety of melt-in-your-mouth flavours.
inventory.image: Product Images/Hershey Pemi Semi Sweet Chocolate Chips.jpg

inventory.name: Rising Crust Half Deluxe Half Pepperoni Pizza
inventory.description: Experience the fresh-baked taste of Delissio Rising Crust Pizza. It’s not delivery, It’s Delissio!

inventory.name: Pizza Pockets
inventory.description: Good food starts from real ingredients. That’s why all of our Pizza Pockets® snacks begin with wholesome ingredients like you’d use if you were making it yourself at home – and of course they’re baked not fried, made with real cheese, contain no artificial colours or flavours and are a source of fibre. Our cheesiest variety is stuffed with real mozzarella, cheddar and Romano cheeses. McCain It’s all good™

inventory.name: Zabiha Halal BBQ style Chicken Wings
inventory.description: Our Maple Lodge Farms Zabiha Halal chicken breast strips are made with premium whole chicken breast meat, crispy breading and flavourful seasoning. They are easy to prepare and contain 0 trans fat.
inventory.image: Product Images/MapleLodge BBQ Style Chicken Wings.jpg

inventory.name: Veal Parmigiana
inventory.description: Stouffer's Veal Parmigiana with linguine in tomato sauce.

inventory.name: Backyard Barbeque
inventory.description: Hungry-Man meals offer great tasting foods that men love. With options ranging from original Classic Fried Chicken to pub-style Beer Battered Fried Chicken, Hungry-Man dinners are a quick, satisfying meal to help you get on with your day.

inventory.name: Shoestring Fries
inventory.description: A spin on the classic, these thin and crispy fries are the perfect size.

inventory.name: Pogos
inventory.description: Grab a POGO® for a satisfying lunch or snack that's ready in minutes. They're convenient when your big kids come home from school scrounging for food. Their sticks make them fun to eat and it’s quick and easy to clean up.

inventory.name: Sweet and Sour Chicken
inventory.description: Get the best of both sweet and sour flavours with this delicious dish made with tender chunks of chicken, rice, pineapple, and red green peppers in a flavourful sauce.
inventory.image: Product Images/VH Streamers Sweet and Sour Chicken.jpg

inventory.name: Sweet Sesame Chicken
inventory.description: Sweet and spicy sesame sauce complements generous chunks of chicken tenderloin, soft white rice, and vegetables.
inventory.image: Product Images/Healthy Choice Sweet Sesame Chicken.jpg

inventory.name: Cookies and Cream Ice Cream
inventory.description: Enjoy your favourite ice cream parlour flavours with Nestle Parlour. Try our new Cookies and Cream!
inventory.image: Product Images/Nestlé Parlour Cookies and Cream.jpg

inventory.name: Triple Rockets Ice Pops
inventory.description: Enjoy the flavour combination of cherry, white lemon and grape found in Triple Rockets. Made with fruit juice and no artificial colours they’re a refreshing treat for kids and adults alike.

inventory.name: Pralines and Cream
inventory.description: Pure creamy vanilla ice cream infused with crunchy praline pecans and thick rich swirls of smooth gooey caramel.

inventory.name: Simply Dipped Cookies and Cream Drumstick(4pk)
inventory.description: Nestlé DRUMSTICK Simply Dipped is Simply Delicious! It’s the perfect treat for you and your family. It has the same rich chocolatey coating, crispy sugar cone and delicious chocolatey tip as the Drumstick you love without the nuts*. (*Produced on equipment that produces nuts)
inventory.image: Product Images/Nestlé Drumstick Cookies and Cream.jpg

inventory.name: Smarties Ice Cream
inventory.description: Packed with fun flavour, SMARTIES candy pieces are swirled throughout delicious creamy vanilla chocolatey goodness. Plus SMARTIES have the added benefit of natureal flavours and colours.

inventory.name: LifeSavers Ice Pops
inventory.description: A fun and exciting treat every kid is sure to love!

inventory.name: Spaghetti Sauce Mix
inventory.description: A creamy red sauce with Cheddar and parmesan cheese flavours.
inventory.image: Product Images/Club House Spaghetti Sauce Mix.jpg

inventory.name: Pasta Sauce Original (1.75L)
inventory.description: Prego is so full of flavour, you don't need to add a thing. The hearty Italian sauce, made from red vine ripened tomatoes, has a fullness of flavour you can taste in every bite.

inventory.name: Chili Seasoning Mix
inventory.description: The perfect blend of spices to create your family's favourite chili. Serve prepared chili with crusty bread and shredded Cheddar cheese. Also great served over hot dogs and baked potatoes.

inventory.name: Tomato and Basil Light (700mL)
inventory.description: A tasty compliment to your active lifestyle
inventory.image: Product Images/Ragu Tomato and Basil Light.jpg

inventory.name: Linguine
inventory.description: We proudly use only 100% Canadian durum semolina. We select only product made from the heart of the finest grade of wheat. We do not use any alcohol or products of animal origin in the production of our pasta. Kosher certified. Contains wheat. May contain egg.

inventory.name: Lasagna
inventory.description: Looking for a pasta dish with a little more flair? Italpasta also offers a wide range of oven pastas in our signature classic recipe, spinach, and whole wheat. For that traditional baked pasta recipe that everyone loves – try Italpasta lasagna. Your family will thank you.

inventory.name: 25% Less Salt Gravy Mix for Turkey
inventory.description: Contains 25% less salt than regular Club House gravy mix for Turkey has the same meaty roast gravy and poultry-style herb flavour.For a richer flavour prepare Club House gravy mix for Turkey as per package directions on the stove top.
inventory.image: Product Images/Club House 25% Less Salt Gravy Mix for Turkey.jpg

inventory.name: Breakfast Potatos Potato Pancakes
inventory.description: Made from real shredded potatoes and lightly seasoned with onion and spices, these potato pancakes have the perfect savoury flavour.

inventory.name: Sour Cream and Chives Pasta
inventory.description: A rich sour cream sauce with chopped chives over rippled pasta.
inventory.image: Product Images/Knorr Sidekicks Sour Cream and Chives Pasta.jpg
